column4: q: is there a(n easy) way to upgrade the firefox in warty without committing to hoary ?
I cheated, I changed warty to hoary in the sources.list, updated (NOT upgraded) then I upgraded firefox, hurried back and changed hoary to warty
that won't mess anything up will it ? I'm too green with package managers to take risks..
try something silly then, update an app you don't use often, for practice, if you will, but it worked for me, ne'ertheless
